risk_overview.business_description: A manufacturing company producing precision metal parts and assemblies for the automotive sector, with expertise in CNC machining, stamped parts, and sub-assemblies for leading UK and European car manufacturers.

risk_management.environmental_management_commitment: The company operates an Environmental Management System (EMS) accredited to ISO 14001 standard, targeting a 30% reduction in carbon emissions by 2030 and achieving zero waste to landfill by 2027.

locations.address: Units 5-7, Riverside Industrial Estate, Birmingham, B12 8QT
locations.construction_type: Steel frame construction with composite cladding panels and concrete flooring
locations.occupancy: Primary manufacturing site - CNC machining, metal stamping, and assembly

locations.address: Building 12, Coventry Business Park, Coventry, CV3 4FJ
locations.construction_type: Steel portal frame with insulated metal cladding
locations.occupancy: Secondary manufacturing facility with quality testing laboratory

locations.construction_type: Concrete block construction with steel roof
locations.occupancy: Storage and distribution of finished goods

fire_protection.sprinkler_details: Wet sprinkler systems at Birmingham and Coventry locations installed to LPC standards. ESFR sprinkler system at Rugby warehouse.
fire_protection.smoke_detection_details: Addressable fire detection systems installed at all sites linked to central monitoring station
fire_protection.fire_extinguisher_details: Appropriate fire extinguishers (CO2 and dry powder) located throughout all premises

security.intruder_alarm_details: NSI Gold certified alarm systems with police response at all three sites
security.cctv_details: Full CCTV coverage across all locations with recordings stored for 30 days
security.fencing_details: 2.4 metre steel palisade fencing with electronically controlled access gates

loss_history.description: Small electrical fire in control panel quickly dealt with by employees
Pipe burst resulting in damage to inventory and floor surfaces

risk_improvements.fire_risk_assessment: External fire risk assessments performed annually - most recent assessment completed October 2024 with all identified actions addressed
risk_improvements.staff_fire_safety_training: Annual fire awareness training provided to all employees with quarterly evacuation exercises
risk_improvements.preventive_maintenance: Systematic preventive maintenance schedule for all equipment including weekly checks and annual electrical inspections
risk_improvements.waste_management: Metal swarf and combustible materials removed daily. External waste storage positioned away from main buildings.
risk_improvements.hot_work_procedures: Hot work permit system implemented with mandatory fire watch

employee_breakdown.risk_description: Administrative personnel in HR, accounts, and sales departments
CNC lathe, milling and grinding machine operators. Machines fully guarded. PPE requirements include safety eyewear and steel-capped footwear.
Press operators and tooling technicians. Safety light guards and dual-hand controls fitted to all press equipment. Regular PUWER compliance checks.
Inspection and CMM technicians working in controlled laboratory setting
Forklift drivers and warehouse operatives. All forklift operators hold current certifications. Segregated pedestrian routes in place.

health_and_safety.accident_reporting_system: Digital incident reporting with root cause investigation procedures
health_and_safety.ppe_requirements: PPE requirements defined by task - includes safety spectacles, protective footwear, ear defenders, and task-appropriate gloves
health_and_safety.training_programme: Full induction for new starters plus yearly refreshers. Specific training provided for all machine operators.
health_and_safety.risk_assessments: Complete risk assessment documentation updated annually or following any accident

public_and_products_liability.product_description: Precision manufactured metal parts such as brackets, casings, shafts, and gears. Component assemblies including steering and suspension parts produced to customer drawings and specifications.

component_sourcing.raw_materials: Steel and aluminium supplied by UK-based stockholders with full traceability and certification
component_sourcing.bought_in_components: Standard fasteners and components from UK and European approved suppliers

public_and_products_liability.site_access_control: Visitor sign-in mandatory with safety induction. Hi-vis vests required in factory areas. Manufacturing areas accessible only with escort.

claims_history.description: Employee sustained cut to hand from sharp component edge requiring medical treatment
Worker slipped on wet floor near washroom facilities - lower back strain
